Actions.ActionName: Sets up and validates the resource support variables. This may be called again, in the loop below.
If the locations aren't valid, ask the user to locate them, and repeat until they're valid or canceled.

Actions.Title: %ExecutingMacro%
Actions.ActionName: Display the error message, and let the user cancel if they want
Ask the user to pick the correct folder
Sets up and validates the resource support variables.
